EXPERIENCE.Designation: Teaching Assistant at IITB for Aakash Tablet app development
Teaching Assistant at IITB for Introduction to Computational Complexity course
Member of Student companion programme at IITB
Teaching Assistant at IIT-B for Programming course

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Controlling Bots over the Internet(TCP/IP) using Android based Interface
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Android App which controls several robots placed anywhere around the world. Control signals first goes to a server which controls the Bot wirelessly using a Zigbee module. Response from Bots travels to server machine using Zigbee and from server to Android device via Internet.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Content based query on raster data
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
- Used GRASS(Image Processing tool) and automated it using bash script, for querying on raster data
- Drawn contour lines and analyzed vegetation index of the region, given its raster data.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Security issues in NFC(Near field communication), their countermeasures and using it for Location based Services
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
-Studied security challenges in NFC transaction and the potential misuse of NFC enabled phones   
 for skimming, cloning and relay attacks, also find out the countermeasures for such attacks. 
- Developing an android application for using NFC for location based services more effectively than GPS.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Simulation of Distributed Fair Scheduling Algorithm Using NS2
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Implemented support for distributed fair scheduling for back-off algorithm in wireless LAN using NS2
simulator.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Transfer of media files between server and cell phone using Java ME
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Accessed the camera of the mobile devices to capture images/videos using JavaME MMAPI and transfer them to server and retrieve them later, to circumvent the memory problem of mobile phones.
Identified spectrum scarcity problem in wireless network and propose a model for its solution using Cognitive network.
